driverText: If you have a cargo truck, you can use this mobile app to select the cargo that is suitable for you.
shipperText: With this application, you will be able to find the right truck for your cargo.
logisticsText: With this mobile application, you can keep a profile of your logistics company and earn a good income by taking a lot of orders.
exploreText: Now your finances are in one place and always under your control
registrationText: Please confirm the country code and enter your phone number.
